name: Last Colony v1
description:
VEEERRRYYY UNFINISHED

A worldwide nuclear war has left the world in ruins. Now, as the last surviving colony of Earth, you must fend off the monsters left by the war. 

Move mouse to the edge of the screen to move camera

Left Click the bottom two icons to select buildings

Right Click a building to destroy it

Begin the game by setting some extra defenses with the given materials. A tower costs 50 wood and a wall costs 20 stone. You can get a random upgrade by sacrificing 4 enemies to the radioactive crystal in the middle of the starting base. If the enemies touch the crystal though, its GAME OVER.
